Bought Portal 2 durring a steam sale, took me about 3 days to complete. had an awsome time playing, and was inspired to buy the origional portal. I do wish that the community test chambers could be used ofline without having to look up a guide on how to download them permenantly.
portal 3 !!!! comme vous l'aviez compris tres tres bon jeux :)

Ok this is a fantastic game. Better than the original in the amount of content it has and because it's just generally more funny and enjoyable. However, i did not exactly feel isolated in the later tests with characters talking to me. It didn't feel like a test and more like a trial with some areas in destruction and chaos. With this comes many more creative things with multiple zones in the game almost like it is split into 3 parts which are all very enjoyable. I would recommend playing the first game before this one, as some jokes will not make sense at all if you have not played the original. Also, there is a co-operative game mode where you and a friend or stranger(i think) can complete levels that require two people to complete. It is less serious and easier than single-player i believe. It is better with a friend on a skype call or something. Trust me! i have had good times from this and it is fun trolling your friend on levels that require you to start over when you screw up. Anyway just get it; 10/10 would play again
Portal 2 is everything Portal was and more. Easily the best puzzle game out there, I'm a huge fan of the series :)

Secuela del juego anterior, el doble de largo, con más mecánicas, e incluso más trama y desarrollo de personaje.

Lo único que no me convence es que después un juego y medio con torretas, láseres, etc de repente te meten los fluidos y como que casi dejas atrás de golpe todo lo que has visto hasta ahora. Pero bueno, más salas, más ciencia, ¡más GLaDOS! Qué más se puede pedir.

great. just amazing.

Este juego me lo pasé muchísimas veces en Xbox360 (Si por pasar entendemos pasarse el modo historia sin completar todos los logros) y a cada vez que me lo pasaba descubría algo nuevo sobre su historia. Buen argumento, entretenido y fundamentalmente lógico. Además del "Perpetual Testing Iniciative" que te permite crear tus propias cámaras de pruebas y subirlas al Steam Workshop fácilmente.

This game may be a bit older already but it is definitely worth playing.

PROs:
-> The game is challenging and makes you think. 
-> One of the best villains / antagonists I have ever seen. You'll also smile a lot.
-> The multiplayer is also well made.
-> You can do fun stuff with the portals.

CONs:
-> The final battle is a bit anticlimatic.
-> The game occasionally crashed when I minimized it.
its ok

I've only just now played this game and wow, I am impressed. This was a huge amount of fun from start to finish. The game, in my opinion, didn't get old or boring as it went on. All of the puzzles are unique, some more challenging than the others and they really get you thinking. I mean, that is the point of the game but what I'm trying to say is that if you're looking for a good puzzle game to play then this is it. Might check out the co-op next (and the first game since I played this first).
Tricky game. Keeps your mind on edge. Definitely recommend it!

친구가 없어서 코옵을 못하는게 한 이지만 재미있게 플레이했다. 글라도스누나가 귀엽다. 
한번 마스터 하면 다시 안하게 되지만 하게되면 일부러 시간 끌어서 대사를 전부 듣는다던가 도전과제를 깨는 재미가 있다. 
사람들이 만든맵을 다운받아 할 수 있는것도  큰 장점이다 .
스토리가 보는 재미가 있다.
사운드 트랙도 적절하게 들어가는 것이 마음에 든다.
캐릭터들의 성격이 뚜렷한것도 장점.
글라누님이 전편과 생긴게 달라진게 이상하지만 밋밋하던 글라누님의 성격이 뚜렷하게 드러나서 전편보다 좋다.
总结：配置要求不高。解谜类好游戏。与小伙伴开黑必玩。

"Amazing." 9/10 Hex
Portal 2 is one of the best puzzle games I have ever played. The puzzles are just right. Some hard, some easy, it really challenges the logic side of your brain. The puzzles aren't straightforward, and some may really get you stuck for a bit.

Story: The story is also something special to me. It has its funny moments and its action moments and they all come at the right time to make you keep playing. While I was playing the story I almost couldn't stop, I wanted to solve the puzzles as fast as possible so I could learn more about the story.

Graphics/Hardware requirements: The graphics are great, now I have a potato pc but the minimum system requirments are so low that I was able to play with nice graphics at decent fps. I don't know what the maximum graphics are like, never played on those settings, but overall the game looks beautiful. With great backround design being the best part.

Thanks for reading my review, overall I give this game a 9/10, great puzzles, great story and great graphics. Great music too! :D

Таки закончил прохождение этой игры. Что могу о ней сказать? Шедевр, понравилось больше, чем Half-Life. Сюжет, графика, диалоги - всё находиться на идеальнейшем уровне. Даже глубинный смысл есть. Это пожалуй пока что единственная игра, над концовкой которой я плакал. 11 тортиков из 10 лжи.
